1: כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>If</n> יִמָּצֵ֣א <sup>4672 </sup> <n>If [one] be found</n> חָלָ֗ל <sup>2491 </sup> <n>slain</n> בָּאֲדָמָה֙ <sup>127 </sup> <n>in the land</n> אֲשֶׁר֩ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יְהוָ֨ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> נֹתֵ֤ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>giveth</n> לְךָ֙ לְרִשְׁתָּ֔הּ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>thee to possess</n> נֹפֵ֖ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>it lying</n> בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>in the field</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is not</n> נוֹדַ֖ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>[and] it be not known</n> מִ֥י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>who</n> הִכָּֽהוּ׃ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>who hath slain</n>
2: וְיָצְא֥וּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>shall come forth</n> זְקֵנֶ֖יךָ <sup>2205 </sup> <n>Then thy elders</n> וְשֹׁפְטֶ֑יךָ <sup>8199 </sup> <n>and thy judges</n> וּמָדְדוּ֙ <sup>4058 </sup> <n>and they shall measure</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>unto the cities</n> אֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> סְבִיבֹ֥ת <sup>5439 </sup> <n>which [are] round about</n> הֶחָלָֽל׃ <sup>2491 </sup> <n>him that is slain</n>
3: וְהָיָ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall be that</n> הָעִ֔יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>And it shall be [that] the city</n> הַקְּרֹבָ֖ה <sup>7138 </sup> <n>[which is] next</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הֶחָלָ֑ל <sup>2491 </sup> <n>unto the slain man</n> וְלָֽקְח֡וּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>shall take</n> זִקְנֵי֩ <sup>2205 </sup> <n>even the elders</n> הָעִ֨יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of that city</n> הַהִ֜וא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> עֶגְלַ֣ת <sup>5697 </sup> <n>A heifer</n> בָּקָ֗ר <sup>1241 </sup> <n>of the herd</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>has not</n> עֻבַּד֙ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>which hath not been wrought with</n> בָּ֔הּ אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>and which</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>has not</n> מָשְׁכָ֖ה <sup>4900 </sup> <n>[and] which hath not drawn</n> בְּעֹֽל׃ <sup>5923 </sup> <n>in the yoke</n>
4: וְהוֹרִ֡דוּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>shall bring down</n> זִקְנֵי֩ <sup>2205 </sup> <n>And the elders</n> הָעִ֨יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of that city</n> הַהִ֤וא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָֽעֶגְלָה֙ <sup>5697 </sup> <n>the heifer</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> נַ֣חַל <sup>5158 </sup> <n>valley</n> אֵיתָ֔ן <sup>386 </sup> <n>unto a rough</n> אֲשֶׁ֛ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>has not</n> יֵעָבֵ֥ד <sup>5647 </sup> <n>which is neither eared</n> בּ֖וֹ וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>or</n> יִזָּרֵ֑עַ <sup>2232 </sup> <n>nor sown</n> וְעָֽרְפוּ־ <sup>6202 </sup> <n>neck</n> שָׁ֥ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָעֶגְלָ֖ה <sup>5697 </sup> <n>the heifer's</n> בַּנָּֽחַל׃ <sup>5158 </sup> <n>there in the valley</n>
5: וְנִגְּשׁ֣וּ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>shall come near</n> הַכֹּהֲנִים֮ <sup>3548 </sup> <n>And the priests</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the sons</n> לֵוִי֒ <sup>3878 </sup> <n>of Levi</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> בָ֗ם בָּחַ֞ר <sup>977 </sup> <n>hath chosen</n> יְהוָ֤ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>for them the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> לְשָׁ֣רְת֔וֹ <sup>8334 </sup> <n>to minister</n> וּלְבָרֵ֖ךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>unto him and to bless</n> בְּשֵׁ֣ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>in the name</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and by</n> פִּיהֶ֥ם <sup>6310 </sup> <n>and by their word</n> יִהְיֶ֖ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and every</n> רִ֥יב <sup>7379 </sup> <n>shall every controversy</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and every</n> נָֽגַע׃ <sup>5061 </sup> <n>and every stroke</n>
6: וְכֹ֗ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> זִקְנֵי֙ <sup>2205 </sup> <n>And all the elders</n> הָעִ֣יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of that city</n> הַהִ֔וא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>which</n> הַקְּרֹבִ֖ים <sup>7138 </sup> <n>[that are] next</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הֶחָלָ֑ל <sup>2491 </sup> <n>unto the slain</n> יִרְחֲצוּ֙ <sup>7364 </sup> <n>[man] shall wash</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְדֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>3027 </sup> <n>their hands</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> הָעֶגְלָ֖ה <sup>5697 </sup> <n>over the heifer</n> הָעֲרוּפָ֥ה <sup>6202 </sup> <n>that is beheaded</n> בַנָּֽחַל׃ <sup>5158 </sup> <n>in the valley</n>
7: וְעָנ֖וּ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>And they shall answer</n> וְאָמְר֑וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and say</n> יָדֵ֗ינוּ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>Our hands</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> [שָׁפְכָה כ] (שָֽׁפְכוּ֙ <sup>8210 </sup> <n>cast</n> ק) אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַדָּ֣ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>this blood</n> הַזֶּ֔ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> וְעֵינֵ֖ינוּ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>neither have our eyes</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> רָאֽוּ׃ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>seen</n>
8: כַּפֵּר֩ <sup>3722 </sup> <n>Be merciful</n> לְעַמְּךָ֨ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>unto thy people</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> פָּדִ֙יתָ֙ <sup>6299 </sup> <n>whom thou hast redeemed</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּתֵּן֙ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and lay</n> דָּ֣ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>blood</n> נָקִ֔י <sup>5355 </sup> <n>not innocent</n> בְּקֶ֖רֶב <sup>7130 </sup> <n>charge</n> עַמְּךָ֣ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>unto thy people</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel's</n> וְנִכַּפֵּ֥ר <sup>3722 </sup> <n>shall be forgiven</n> לָהֶ֖ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> הַדָּֽם׃ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>And the blood</n>
9: וְאַתָּ֗ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> תְּבַעֵ֛ר <sup>1197 </sup> <n>So shalt thou put away</n> הַדָּ֥ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>blood</n> הַנָּקִ֖י <sup>5355 </sup> <n>the [guilt of] innocent</n> מִקִּרְבֶּ֑ךָ <sup>7130 </sup> <n>from among</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> תַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>you when thou shalt do</n> הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <sup>3477 </sup> <n>[that which is] right</n> בְּעֵינֵ֥י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in the sight</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> ס
10: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> תֵצֵ֥א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>When thou goest forth</n> לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>to war</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> אֹיְבֶ֑יךָ <sup>341 </sup> <n>against thine enemies</n> וּנְתָנ֞וֹ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>hath delivered</n> יְהוָ֧ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> בְּיָדֶ֖ךָ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>them into thine hands</n> וְשָׁבִ֥יתָ <sup>7617 </sup> <n>and thou hast taken</n> שִׁבְיֽוֹ׃ <sup>7617 </sup> <n>take</n>
11: וְרָאִיתָ֙ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>And seest</n> בַּשִּׁבְיָ֔ה <sup>7633 </sup> <n>among the captives</n> אֵ֖שֶׁת <sup>802 </sup> <n>woman</n> יְפַת־ <sup>3303 </sup> <n>A beautiful</n> תֹּ֑אַר <sup>8389 </sup> <n>be drawn</n> וְחָשַׁקְתָּ֣ <sup>2836 </sup> <n>and hast a desire</n> בָ֔הּ וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>unto her that thou wouldest have her</n> לְךָ֖ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <sup>802 </sup> <n>to thy wife</n>
12: וַהֲבֵאתָ֖הּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>Then thou shalt bring</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> תּ֣וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>her home</n> בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>to thine house</n> וְגִלְּחָה֙ <sup>1548 </sup> <n>and she shall shave</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רֹאשָׁ֔הּ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>her head</n> וְעָשְׂתָ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and pare</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> צִפָּרְנֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>6856 </sup> <n>her nails</n>
13: וְהֵסִ֩ירָה֩ <sup>5493 </sup> <n>And she shall put</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שִׂמְלַ֨ת <sup>8071 </sup> <n>the raiment</n> שִׁבְיָ֜הּ <sup>7633 </sup> <n>captives</n> מֵעָלֶ֗יהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> וְיָֽשְׁבָה֙ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>from off her and shall remain</n> בְּבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>in thine house</n> וּבָֽכְתָ֛ה <sup>1058 </sup> <n>and bewail</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אָבִ֥יהָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>her father</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אִמָּ֖הּ <sup>517 </sup> <n>and her mother</n> יֶ֣רַח <sup>3391 </sup> <n>month</n> יָמִ֑ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>a full</n> וְאַ֨חַר <sup>310 </sup> <n>and after</n> כֵּ֜ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> תָּב֤וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>that thou shalt go</n> אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> וּבְעַלְתָּ֔הּ <sup>1167 </sup> <n>archer</n> וְהָיְתָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לְךָ֖ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <sup>802 </sup> <n>and she shall be thy wife</n>
14: וְהָיָ֞ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>shall be if</n> לֹ֧א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>are not</n> חָפַ֣צְתָּ <sup>2654 </sup> <n>And it shall be if thou have no delight</n> בָּ֗הּ וְשִׁלַּחְתָּהּ֙ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>in her then thou shalt let her go</n> לְנַפְשָׁ֔הּ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>whither she will</n> וּמָכֹ֥ר <sup>4376 </sup> <n>but thou shalt not sell</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִמְכְּרֶ֖נָּה <sup>4376 </sup> <n>her at all</n> בַּכָּ֑סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>for money</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תִתְעַמֵּ֣ר <sup>6014 </sup> <n>thou shalt not make merchandise</n> בָּ֔הּ תַּ֖חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>Thahash</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>of her because</n> עִנִּיתָֽהּ׃ <sup>6031 </sup> <n>thou hast humbled</n> ס
15: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>If</n> תִהְיֶ֨יןָ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>has</n> לְאִ֜ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>If a man</n> שְׁתֵּ֣י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>have two</n> נָשִׁ֗ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>wives</n> הָאַחַ֤ת <sup>259 </sup> <n>one</n> אֲהוּבָה֙ <sup>157 </sup> <n>beloved</n> וְהָאַחַ֣ת <sup>259 </sup> <n>and another</n> שְׂנוּאָ֔ה <sup>8130 </sup> <n>hated</n> וְיָֽלְדוּ־ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>and they have born</n> ל֣וֹ בָנִ֔ים <sup>1121 </sup> <n>him children</n> הָאֲהוּבָ֖ה <sup>157 </sup> <n>[both] the beloved</n> וְהַשְּׂנוּאָ֑ה <sup>8130 </sup> <n>and the hated</n> וְהָיָ֛ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>has</n> הַבֵּ֥ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>son</n> הַבְּכ֖וֹר <sup>1060 </sup> <n>and [if] the firstborn</n> לַשְּׂנִיאָֽה׃ <sup>8146 </sup> <n>be hers that was hated</n>
16: וְהָיָ֗ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>has</n> בְּיוֹם֙ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>Then it shall be when</n> הַנְחִיל֣וֹ <sup>5157 </sup> <n>to inherit</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בָּנָ֔יו <sup>1121 </sup> <n>he maketh his sons</n> אֵ֥ת <sup>853 </sup> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>what</n> יִהְיֶ֖ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>has</n> ל֑וֹ לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>hath he</n> יוּכַ֗ל <sup>3201 </sup> <n>[that] which he hath [that] he may</n> לְבַכֵּר֙ <sup>1060 </sup> <n>[which is indeed] the firstborn</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>not make the son</n> הָ֣אֲהוּבָ֔ה <sup>157 </sup> <n>of the beloved</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> פְּנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> הַשְּׂנוּאָ֖ה <sup>8130 </sup> <n>of the hated</n> הַבְּכֹֽר׃ <sup>1060 </sup> <n>is the firstborn</n>
17: כִּי֩ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַבְּכֹ֨ר <sup>1060 </sup> <n>[for] the firstborn</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> הַשְּׂנוּאָ֜ה <sup>8130 </sup> <n>of the hated</n> יַכִּ֗יר <sup>5234 </sup> <n>But he shall acknowledge</n> לָ֤תֶת <sup>5414 </sup> <n>by giving</n> לוֹ֙ פִּ֣י <sup>6310 </sup> <n>portion</n> שְׁנַ֔יִם <sup>8147 </sup> <n>him a double</n> בְּכֹ֥ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>he</n> יִמָּצֵ֖א <sup>4672 </sup> <n>of all that he hath</n> ל֑וֹ כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הוּא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> רֵאשִׁ֣ית <sup>7225 </sup> <n>for he [is] the beginning</n> אֹנ֔וֹ <sup>202 </sup> <n>of his strength</n> ל֖וֹ מִשְׁפַּ֥ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>the right</n> הַבְּכֹרָֽה׃ <sup>1062 </sup> <n>of the firstborn</n> ס
18: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>If</n> יִהְיֶ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>has</n> לְאִ֗ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>If a man</n> בֵּ֚ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>son</n> סוֹרֵ֣ר <sup>5637 </sup> <n>have a stubborn</n> וּמוֹרֶ֔ה <sup>4784 </sup> <n>and rebellious</n> אֵינֶ֣נּוּ <sup>369 </sup> <n>even</n> שֹׁמֵ֔עַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>which will not obey</n> בְּק֥וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>the voice</n> אָבִ֖יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>of his father</n> וּבְק֣וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>or the voice</n> אִמּ֑וֹ <sup>517 </sup> <n>of his mother</n> וְיִסְּר֣וּ <sup>3256 </sup> <n>and [that] when they have chastened</n> אֹת֔וֹ <sup>853 </sup> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>even</n> יִשְׁמַ֖ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>him will not hearken</n> אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n>
19: וְתָ֥פְשׂוּ <sup>8610 </sup> <n>lay hold</n> ב֖וֹ אָבִ֣יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>Then shall his father</n> וְאִמּ֑וֹ <sup>517 </sup> <n>and his mother</n> וְהוֹצִ֧יאוּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>on him and bring him out</n> אֹת֛וֹ <sup>853 </sup> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>unto</n> זִקְנֵ֥י <sup>2205 </sup> <n>unto the elders</n> עִיר֖וֹ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of his city</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>at</n> שַׁ֥עַר <sup>8179 </sup> <n>and unto the gate</n> מְקֹמֽוֹ׃ <sup>4725 </sup> <n>of his place</n>
20: וְאָמְר֞וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And they shall say</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> זִקְנֵ֣י <sup>2205 </sup> <n>unto the elders</n> עִיר֗וֹ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of his city</n> בְּנֵ֤נוּ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>This our son</n> זֶה֙ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>This</n> סוֹרֵ֣ר <sup>5637 </sup> <n>[is] stubborn</n> וּמֹרֶ֔ה <sup>4784 </sup> <n>and rebellious</n> אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <sup>369 </sup> <n>will not</n> שֹׁמֵ֖עַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>he will not obey</n> בְּקֹלֵ֑נוּ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>our voice</n> זוֹלֵ֖ל <sup>2151 </sup> <n>[he is] a glutton</n> וְסֹבֵֽא׃ <sup>5435 </sup> <n>drink</n>
21: וּ֠רְגָמֻהוּ <sup>7275 </sup> <n>shall stone</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אַנְשֵׁ֨י <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> עִיר֤וֹ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of his city</n> בָֽאֲבָנִים֙ <sup>68 </sup> <n>him with stones</n> וָמֵ֔ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>that he die</n> וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֥ <sup>1197 </sup> <n>away</n> הָרָ֖ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>evil</n> מִקִּרְבֶּ֑ךָ <sup>7130 </sup> <n>from among</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>you and all Israel</n> יִשְׁמְע֥וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>shall hear</n> וְיִרָֽאוּ׃ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>and fear</n> ס
22: וְכִֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>If</n> יִהְיֶ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>has committed</n> בְאִ֗ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And if a man</n> חֵ֛טְא <sup>2399 </sup> <n>have committed a sin</n> מִשְׁפַּט־ <sup>4941 </sup> <n>worthy of</n> מָ֖וֶת <sup>4194 </sup> <n>death</n> וְהוּמָ֑ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>and he be to be put to death</n> וְתָלִ֥יתָ <sup>8518 </sup> <n>and thou hang</n> אֹת֖וֹ <sup>853 </sup> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> עֵֽץ׃ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>him on a tree</n>
